# Alley-wise, Ghetto-smart (Trait)
## Overview
**Alley-wise, Ghetto-smart**

You spent your youth in the darker parts of Zobeck, near [[3a2c - The Kobold Ghetto|the Kobold Ghetto]]. You start play with Draconic as a bonus language and you receive a +2 trait bonus on [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks with kobolds. [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] is always a class skill.

**Source:** Streets of Zobeck (Open Design), pg. 87
